post.subject: Character Event Warps: Earth Hurled, Ether Curled and Bloom in Gloom
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/07/29/c0aef3bc464e9b02ac57cfe488c7bcb7_2823156848062414290.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"320328"}},{"insert":"
Hello, Trailblazers!
Character Event Warp Period for this phase is from the end of the 2.4 version update to 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time) and includes the following content:

▌Earth Hurled, Ether Curled Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Yunli (Destruction: Physical) and 4-star characters Hanya (Harmony: Physical), Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary), and Lynx (Abundance: Quantum) will be boosted.

■Event Duration
After the Version 2.4 update – 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Yunli (Destruction: Physical)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Hanya (Harmony: Physical)
Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary)
Lynx (Abundance: Quantum)

▌"Bloom in Gloom" Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Huohuo (Abundance: Wind) and 4-star characters Hanya (Harmony: Physical), Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary), and Lynx (Abundance: Quantum) will be boosted.

■Event Duration
After the Version 2.4 update – 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Huohuo (Abundance: Wind)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Hanya (Harmony: Physical)
Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary)
Lynx (Abundance: Quantum)

※ Among the above characters, the limited character will not be available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star character Yunli (Destruction: Physical) can only be obtained from the Character Event Warp Earth Hurled, Ether Curled while the limited 5-star character Huohuo (Abundance: Wind) can only be obtained from the Character Event Warp Bloom in Gloom.
※ This Warp is considered a Character Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star character in any Character Event Warp will always be carried over to other Character Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.

▌Temporary Early Access for Material Stages"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Event Period: After the Version 2.4 update – 2024/08/28 11:59:00 (server time)
●Event Details: During the event period, Ascension and Trace Material stages for Yunli (Destruction: Physical) and Huohuo (Abundance: Wind) will be made temporarily available. If Trailblazers haven't unlocked these stages, they can use the "Interastral Peace Guide - Survival Index" to challenge the stages directly.
●Available In This Period:
Stagnant Shadow: Shape of Duty, Shape of Celestial
Calyx (Crimson): Bud of Destruction (Scalegorge Waterscape), Bud of Abundance (Backwater Pass)

▌Character Trial Event: Aptitude Showcase"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Requirement: Unlock Travel Log
●Event Period: After the Version 2.4 update – 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time)
●Event Details: Trial characters Yunli (Destruction: Physical), Huohuo (Abundance: Wind), Hanya (Harmony: Physical), Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary), and Lynx (Abundance: Quantum) can be used to experience stages. Upon completing the challenges, Trailblazers can obtain Stellar Jade, Adventure Log, Universal Enhancement Material, and credit.
"}]

lang_subject.ru-ru: Прыжки события персонажа: «Свернуть горы, рассеять облака», «Цветочек во мраке»
lang_subject.zh-cn: 角色活动跃迁：「掷山破云」、「令奉贞凶」
lang_subject.de-de: Figuren-Aktionswarps: „Geworfener Berg, gebrochene Wolke“ und „Unbeirrt im Unheil“
lang_subject.id-id: Event Warp Karakter: "Membelah Gunung, Menebas Awan" & "Titah Penakluk Kejahatan"
lang_subject.pt-pt: Salto Hiperespacial de Evento de Personagem "Terra Arremessada, Nuvens Fragmentadas" e "Floreio na Escuridão"
lang_subject.ko-kr: 캐릭터 이벤트 워프: 「산과 구름을 가르는 기세」, 「불운에 대한 직시」
lang_subject.en-us: Character Event Warps: Earth Hurled, Ether Curled and Bloom in Gloom
lang_subject.fr-fr: Sauts événements de personnages : Nuages dispersés par les montagnes et Lueur au milieu des ténèbres
lang_subject.es-es: Saltos de evento de personaje «Montañas derribadas y nubes reventadas» y «Florecimiento sombrío»
lang_subject.vi-vn: Bước Nhảy Sự Kiện Nhân Vật: Dời Núi Xẻ Mây, Hoa Nở U Sầu
lang_subject.zh-tw: 角色活動躍遷：「擲山破雲」、「令奉貞凶」
lang_subject.th-th: กิจกรรมวาร์ปตัวละคร: "ฝ่าภูผาทะลวงเมฆา" และ "หาญกล้าประกาศิต"
lang_subject.ja-jp: イベント跳躍・キャラクター：「擲山破雲」、「貞凶の令を承りて」

post.desc: Hello, Trailblazers! Character Event Warp Period for this phase is from the end of the 2.4 version update to 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time) and includes the following content: ▌Earth Hurled, Ether Curled Character Event Warp

user.introduce: May This Journey Lead Us Starward
